title: General Knowledge: Our World
description: Explore fascinating facts about our world, India, and everyday knowledge through engaging topics for Class 2 students.

subtopics.title: Our World
subtopics.content:
## Our Solar System and Earth

We live on planet Earth. The Sun is the nearest star to Earth. Jupiter is the largest planet in our Solar System. There are 7 continents on Earth. The Sun rises in the East and sets in the West.
subtopics.codeExample:
### World Facts Questions:
- Which planet do we live on?
- What is the nearest star to Earth?
- Where does the Sun rise?

### Practice:
- Name the largest planet
- Count the continents on Earth
- Identify: Sun rises in __

subtopics.title: India and Around
subtopics.content:
## India Facts

The capital of India is New Delhi. Mahatma Gandhi is known as the Father of the Nation. National animal of India is the Tiger. National bird is the Peacock. National flower is the Lotus.
subtopics.codeExample:
### India Questions:
- What is India's capital?
- Who is Father of the Nation?
- Name India's national animal?

### Practice:
- Match symbols to India
- Fill: National bird is __
- Identify national flower

subtopics.title: Everyday GK
subtopics.content:
## Daily Life Knowledge

A clock tells time. Wear a raincoat when it rains. A cow gives milk. We use eyes to see. There are 7 days in a week.
subtopics.codeExample:
### Everyday Questions:
- What does a clock show?
- What to wear in rain?
- How many days in a week?

### Practice:
- Match uses: cow-milk
- Identify senses: eyes-see
- Count days in a week
